channel.title: Gamers Centre
channel.description:
[center][img]http://pspmedia.ign.com/psp/images/masthead.gif[/img][/center] Gamers Centre
What is gamers centre: Gamers Centre is a place to make Forums and find clans, Suggest video games to others
Why: Its an easy way to make friends over games.
The Website is: www.gamerscentre.usersboard.com
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Ok, Now On To COD RTV
My clan will be located there. We play all types of matches. Thanks
